resources.string: In order to the app works correctly, you need to set some settings so we can calculate the exact time of the prayer times for you.
If you have a backup file from before you can load it here.
your location list is empty. please add new location
button below to add your location.\n
You can add more locations any time.
Each method provides different results. It is Your responsibility to search and use the right method.
The type of lunar calendar shown in main screen and widgets
The app’s lunar calendar is pre-calculated and may not be accurate because it isn’t based on moon sightings. This especially important to note for the start and end of Ramadan.
Who Is Your Favorite Muazzin?\nWhen Should We Play Azan?
Choose when you want Azan to be played and when you want to get notified.
Tahajjud is last third part of the night
Let Us Remind Your PrayerTimes\nAs You Like.
Should phone vibrate when Azan or reminders start playing ?
If enabled, a notification will be shown around one hour before any prayer time or reminder that has sound
If enabled, when a notification is shown, it will contain info for the next prayer time
Adjust when “Upcoming Alarm” notification will be shown. Both Azan and reminder.
Should app still play Azan when “Do not Disturb” is active ?
When using headphones, all audio will play only on headphones.
Azan stops playing when the volume button is pressed.
When enabled, the screen will remain off when Azan or reminder starts playing, and alarm screen won’t be shown.

In order to app keep working perfectly, you need to allow it be running in the background or battery optimization settings on your phone will close the app after a few minutes.
To to so follow steps below:
 1- Hit the button below to open battery optimization settings.
 2- Find the Al-Azan App in the list.
 3- Disable the Power Optimization For Al-Azan
 4- You Are Done

Some devices need extra settings inside the Power Manager to let the app keeps running in the background. If you fixed previous step and still facing problem, use these steps:
 1- Hit the button below to open Power Manager
 2- Find the Al-Azan App in the list.
 3- Disable the Power Saving For Al-Azan
 4- You Are Done

Samsung devices have their own custom Power Manager called “Device Care”.

For Samsung users:
 1- Hit the button to open Battery Menu.
 2- Open “Background usage limits”
 3- open “Never auto sleeping apps”
 4- Hit the “+” button on top
 5- Find and add the “Al-Azan” app.
 6- You are done.

Note: If you didn’t find the app in the list you probably don’t need to do this part.
The app might not work properly if you skip the setup!
Do you really want to skip?

You can add your location in 3 different ways. Choose one below:
 • Search By City
 • Find Use Location
 • Using Coordinates
